text: At least three banks, all now defunct, have borne the name, Global Trust Bank: *Global Trust Bank (India) *Global Trust Bank (Uganda) * Global Trust Bank of Mountain View, California, was established on 3 December 2008 and merged into Bay Commercial Bank, of Walnut Creek, California, on 19 October 2011. In addition, there are reports that financial scammers on occasion use the Global Trust Bank name in their schemes. One example is the Global Trust Bank PLC, Benin.Scam email alert, - accessed 3 November 2014.
title: Global Trust Bank
